summary: Scoia'tael Bows it is a modification that adds to the game two new bows, Scoia'tael Longbow, Scoia'tael Shortbow and two sets of arrows.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Verdana][center][size=6][color=#274E13][b]Scoiatael Bows[/b][/color][/size]

[size=4][b]This modification will no longer be updated.
Only version for Skyrim Special Edytion will be developed further.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/2027/?]>>> Scoiatael Bows for Skyrim Special Edition <<<[/url]
[/b][/size]

[size=4][color=#ff7700][b]Description[/b][/color][/size]
Scoia'tael Bows it is a modification that adds to the game two new bows.
Scoia'tael Longbow, Scoia'tael Shortbow and two sets of arrows.
Everything available in [url=http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/2409532-1392370500.jpg]Elven category at the forge[/url].
(you must have Elven Smithing Perk)

The modification is compatible with all other mods because it only adds new items to the game and does not edit any existing ones.

For Skyrim Redone users I recommend look here [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48629/?]SkyRe Compatibility and ReProccer Patches by Xathra[/url].
(ONLY SUPPORTED).

Installer is compatible with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1840/?]Wrye Bash[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/modmanager/?]Nexus Mod Manager[/url].

[size=4][color=#FF9900][b]Like what I did, go back and support me.
This is the best way to thank me for my work.

I tried to do everything as best I can.
If you notice any mistakes, errors please let me know.
Comments, suggestions, pictures, any feedback etc... greatly appreciated.

Of course, all with approval from Wicked_Jester.[/b][/color][/size]

[quote]
Pretty cool what you did there :D

To be honest, I don't really play skyrim that regularly anymore and therefore also stopped updating my mods or create new ones.

Because of that, I'd suggest the following:
You upload your stuff somewhere to nexus.
I'll post a link on the mod's original site directing the users to your update.
If you want to modify the files futher, you have my permission to do whatever you please with the files,
so you don't have to check back with me everytime you want to change something ;)

If you have finished the upload, just send me the url, and I'll add it to the original mod page.

Thanks for your great work.

Wicked_Jester[/quote]

[size=4][color=#FF9900][b]Credits[/b][/color][/size]
Thank you [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/388377/?]Wicked_Jester[/url] for the Scoia'tael Weapons and the possibility of further development of this mod.
[url=https://github.com/figment/max_nif_plugin/releases]3ds Max Nif Plugin[/url]
[url=http://afkmods.iguanadons.net/index.php?/topic/4136-nifskope-20-dev/]NifSkope[/url]
[url=http://notepad-plus-plus.org/download]Notepad++[/url]
[url=http://www.gimp.org/downloads/]GIMP[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/?]Team and community nexusmods.com[/url]
[url=https://www.cdprojekt.com/]CD Project[/url] for their original textures for the bows and quivers.
[url=http://bethsoft.com/en-gb]Bethesda[/url]


[size=4][color=#c80000][b]You CAN NOT use anything from My modification on website that makes money directly or through advertising.
>>> The only exception is www.nexusmods.com <<<
You CAN NOT use anything from My modification on Steam Workshop or Bethesda.net.
In other cases for permission ask via PM.[/b][/color][/size][/center][/font]
author: InsanePlumber

files.name: IPM - Scoiatael Weapons
files.changelogHtml:
Version 3.5 (SUPPORTING ONLY THIS VERSION)
- Optimized all NIF files.
(error that caused the disappearance of bows after dropping to the ground)
- More realistic recipe to create bows.
(changed the number and variety of ingredients needed to create bows)
- More realistic recipe to create arrows.
(changed the number and variety of ingredients needed to create arrows)
- More realistic recipe for tempering.
(changed the number and variety of ingredients needed for tempering)
- Separation bows on a Scoia'tael Longbow and Scoia'tael Shortbow.
(Longbow colored, Shortbow black - size reduced with respect to Longbow -20%)
- Modification only supports Skyrim Version 1.9.32.0.8(OTHER VERSIONS OF SKYRIM NOT SUPPORTED)

Version InfoVersion 3.0 (NOT SUPPORTED)
- Installer compatybile with NMM and Wrye Bash
- Improved textures (DTX compresion)
- Improved size from 1022x1024x to 1024x1024, so that everything worked fine.
(no longer lag when drawning bow in first person perspective.)
- Optimized all NIF files.
(patch to the files with textures)
- And mentoinedabove esp file.
